description: This week on Marketplace Money, host Lizzie O'Leary and personal finance expert Liz Weston discuss what parents should know about financial aid offers from colleges and universities, and what to look out for to make sure they're making the right decision when it comes to loans. Weston and O'Leary also take a few questions from listeners on navigating 0% credit offers and how to best handle unexpected medical expenses. Psychology professor Ryan Howell explains how spending money on the right things could lead to happiness, and actress Annabelle Gurwitch tells us what she learned about money from her family growing up.
title: Marketplace Money for Friday, April 25, 2014

Psychology professor Ryan Howell explains how spending money on the right things could lead to happiness, and actress Annabelle Gurwitch tells us what she learned about money from her family growing up.
byline: Raghu Manavalan, Nick White and Candace Manriquez
